content: Are people in New York working more days annually than they used to?

I can't provide real-time data or specific information about current trends in work hours or days worked in New York or any other location. However, I can tell you that work patterns can change over time due to various factors such as economic conditions, technological advancements, and changes in labor laws or policies. It's possible that people in New York, or anywhere else, may be working more or fewer days annually compared to previous years, depending on these factors. For accurate and up-to-date information, I recommend checking recent reports from reliable sources such as government labor statistics or reputable research institutions.
